mainBoard.name: Thunder-Thrash Elder
mainBoard.originalText: Devour 3 (As this comes into play, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature comes into play with three times that many +1/+1 counters on it.)

rulings.text: You may choose not to sacrifice any creatures for the Devour ability.

If you cast this as a spell, you choose how many and which creatures to devour as part of the resolution of that spell. (It can’t be countered at this point.) The same is true of a spell or ability that lets you put a creature with devour onto the battlefield.

You may sacrifice only creatures that are already on the battlefield. If a creature with devour and another creature are entering the battlefield under your control at the same time, the creature with devour can’t devour that other creature. The creature with devour also can’t devour itself.

If multiple creatures with devour are entering the battlefield under your control at the same time, you may use each one’s devour ability. A creature you already control can be devoured by only one of them, however. (In other words, you can’t sacrifice the same creature to satisfy multiple devour abilities.) All creatures devoured this way are sacrificed at the same time.

If you cast this as a spell, you choose how many and which creatures to devour as part of the resolution of that spell. (It can’t be countered at this point.) The same is true of a spell or ability that lets you put a creature with devour onto the battlefield.

You may sacrifice only creatures that are already on the battlefield. If a creature with devour and another creature are entering the battlefield under your control at the same time, the creature with devour can’t devour that other creature. The creature with devour also can’t devour itself.

If multiple creatures with devour are entering the battlefield under your control at the same time, you may use each one’s devour ability. A creature you already control can be devoured by only one of them, however. (In other words, you can’t sacrifice the same creature to satisfy multiple devour abilities.) All creatures devoured this way are sacrificed at the same time.

rulings.text: You may choose not to sacrifice any creatures for the Devour ability.

If you cast this as a spell, you choose how many and which creatures to devour as part of the resolution of that spell. (It can’t be countered at this point.) The same is true of a spell or ability that lets you put a creature with devour onto the battlefield.

You may sacrifice only creatures that are already on the battlefield. If a creature with devour and another creature are entering the battlefield under your control at the same time, the creature with devour can’t devour that other creature. The creature with devour also can’t devour itself.

If multiple creatures with devour are entering the battlefield under your control at the same time, you may use each one’s devour ability. A creature you already control can be devoured by only one of them, however. (In other words, you can’t sacrifice the same creature to satisfy multiple devour abilities.) All creatures devoured this way are sacrificed at the same time.

The number of Saproling tokens created by the triggered ability is based on the number of +1/+1 counters on Mycoloth, not on the number of creatures Mycoloth devoured. It doesn’t matter where the +1/+1 counters came from.

mainBoard.name: Resounding Thunder
mainBoard.originalText:
Resounding Thunder deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
Cycling {5}{B}{R}{G} ({5}{B}{R}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Resounding Thunder, it deals 6 damage to target creature or player.

rulings.text: Cycling is an activated ability. Effects that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle or Rings of Brighthearth) will interact with cycling. Effects that interact with spells (such as Remove Soul or Faerie Tauntings) will not.

When you cycle this card, first the cycling ability goes on the stack, then the triggered ability goes on the stack on top of it. The triggered ability will resolve before you draw a card from the cycling ability.

The cycling ability and the triggered ability are separate. If the triggered ability doesn’t resolve (due to being countered with Stifle, for example, or if all its targets have become illegal), the cycling ability will still resolve and you’ll draw a card.
You can cycle this card even if there are no targets for the triggered ability. That’s because the cycling ability itself has no targets.

mainBoard.text:
Resounding Thunder deals 3 damage to any target.
Cycling {5}{B}{R}{G} ({5}{B}{R}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Resounding Thunder, it deals 6 damage to any target.

mainBoard.flavorText: The sky is the dragon's throne, the seat from which it issues its fiery decrees.

foreignData.flavorText: Der Himmel ist der Thron des Drachens, von wo aus er seine flammenden Anweisungen gibt.
foreignData.name: Panorama von Jund
foreignData.text:
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {1}.
{1}, {T}, opfere das Panorama von Jund: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einem Standardsumpf, einem Standardgebirge oder einem Standardwald und bringe das Land getappt ins Spiel. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.

foreignData.flavorText: El cielo es el trono del dragón, desde donde dicta su decretos ígneos.
foreignData.name: Panorama de Jund
foreignData.text:
{T}: Agrega {1} a tu reserva de maná.
{1}, {T}, sacrificar el Panorama de Jund: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de pantano, montaña o bosque básica y ponla en juego girada. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.

foreignData.flavorText: Le ciel est le trône du dragon, le siège depuis lequel il impose ses lois incendiaires.
foreignData.name: Panorama de Jund
foreignData.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {1} à votre réserve.
{1}, {T}, sacrifiez le Panorama de Jund : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de base de marais, de montagne ou de forêt et mettez-la en jeu engagée. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.

foreignData.flavorText: Il cielo è il trono del drago, il posto in cui emana i suoi decreti infuocati.
foreignData.name: Panorama di Jund
foreignData.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {1} alla tua riserva di mana.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifica il Panorama di Jund: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta Palude, Montagna o Foresta base e mettila in gioco TAPpata. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.

foreignData.flavorText: 空は竜の王宮であり、炎の命じを下す玉座である。
foreignData.name: ジャンドの全景
foreignData.text:
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{1}を加える。
{1}, {T}, ジャンドのの全景を生け贄に捧げる：あなたのライブラリーから基本沼カード１枚か基本山カード１枚か基本森カード１枚を探し、それをタップ状態で場に出す。 その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。

foreignData.flavorText: O céu é o trono do dragão, o assento do qual lança seus decretos flamejantes.
foreignData.name: Panorama de Jund
foreignData.text:
{T}: Adicione {1} à sua reserva de mana.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifique Panorama de Jund: Procure em seu grimório por um card de terreno básico do tipo Pântano, Montanha ou Floresta e coloque-o em jogo virado. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.

foreignData.flavorText: Небо это трон дракона, чертог, из которого он издает свои огненные указы.
foreignData.name: Панорама Джанда
foreignData.text:
{T}: добавьте {1} в ваше хранилище маны.
{1}, {T}, пожертвуйте Панораму Джанда: найдите в вашей библиотеке карту базового Болота, Горы или Леса и положите ее в игру повернутой. Затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.

foreignData.flavorText: 天空是龙的王座，他在该处宣布火热裁决。
foreignData.name: 勇得全景
foreignData.text:
{T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。
{1}，{T}，牺牲勇得全景：从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本的沼泽，山脉，或树林牌，并将之横置进场。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

mainBoard.name: Jund Panorama
mainBoard.originalText:

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Jund Panorama: Search your library for a basic Swamp, Mountain, or Forest card and put it into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.
mainBoard.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Jund Panorama: Search your library for a basic Swamp, Mountain, or Forest card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

mainBoard.flavorText: Jund is a world as cruel as those who call it home. Their brutal struggles scar the land even as it carves them in its image, a vicious circle spiraling out of control.

foreignData.flavorText: Jund ist als Welt so grausam wie die Lebewesen, die dort wohnen. Das brutale Mühen ums Überleben vernarbt das Land ebenso wie das Land seine Bewohner: ein Teufelskreis, der außer Kontrolle gerät.
foreignData.name: Wilde Landschaften
foreignData.text:
Die Wilden Landschaften kommen getappt ins Spiel.
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {B}, {R} oder {G}.

foreignData.flavorText: Jund es un mundo tan cruel como quienes lo llaman hogar. Sus luchas brutales marcan la tierra tanto como ésta a ellos, un círculo vicioso fuera de control.
foreignData.name: Tierras salvajes
foreignData.text:
Las Tierras salvajes entran en juego giradas.
{T}: Agrega {B}, {R}, o {G} a tu reserva de maná.

foreignData.flavorText: Jund est un monde aussi cruel que ses habitants. Leurs luttes brutales blessent la terre à mesure qu'elle les façonne à son image... Un cercle vicieux qui échappe à tout contrôle.
foreignData.name: Terres sauvages
foreignData.text:
Les Terres sauvages arrivent en jeu engagées.
{T} : Ajoutez {B}, {R} ou {G} à votre réserve.

foreignData.flavorText: Jund è un mondo crudele quanto coloro che la chiamano casa. Le loro lotte intestine deturpano la terra proprio mentre essa li scolpisce a sua immagine, un circolo vizioso ben presto fuori controllo.
foreignData.name: Territori Selvaggi
foreignData.text:
I Territori Selvaggi entrano in gioco TAPpati.
{T}: Aggiungi {B}, {R} o {G} alla tua riserva di mana.

foreignData.flavorText: ジャンドは、そこを故郷と呼ぶものと同じぐらい残忍な世界だ。 彼らの残忍な争いはその地に傷を残し、それはあたかも手に負えない凶暴な螺旋をかたどるようだ。
foreignData.name: 野蛮な地
foreignData.text:
野蛮な地はタップ状態で場に出る。
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{B}か{R}か{G}を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: Jund é um mundo tão cruel quanto aqueles que ali habitam. Suas violentas brigas deixam cicatrizes no terreno, ao mesmo tempo que imprimem nele sua imagem, um círculo vicioso fora de controle.
foreignData.name: Terras Selvagens
foreignData.text:
Terras Selvagens entra em jogo virado.
{T}: Adicione {B}, {R} ou {G} à sua reserva de mana.

foreignData.flavorText: Джанд мир такой же жестокий, как и те, кто называет его своим домом. Безжалостные сражения оставляют на земле рубцы, а земля иссекает противников по своему образу и подобию, создавая порочный круг, который стремительно становится неуправляемым.
foreignData.name: Дикие Земли
foreignData.text:
Дикие Земли входят в игру повернутыми.

foreignData.flavorText: 勇得这世界与其间居民一样残酷。 各种野蛮搏斗在大地划下伤痕，大地则型塑这些蛮兽，构成无法控制的残暴循环。
